CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: When the morphologies of active layers were observed by transmission electron microscopy , the PTATDPP : PC71BM blend shows clearly a fibril nanostructure ( fibril width ∼ 30 nm ) with the formation of a bi-continuous network , whereas the PTAFDPP : PC71BM blend shows a phase - separated morphology without the formation of distinct nanostructures , as shown in Fig.

Let's think step by step.

1. PTATDPP
2. PC71BM
3. PTAFDPP
4. PC71BM (mentioned twice, but considered as the same material)

These are the material names mentioned in the paragraph.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Material Name.

1. PTATDPP
2. PTAFDPP
3. PC71BM

These are the material names explicitly mentioned in the paragraph.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

PN.content:
Please identify the "Property Name" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: When the morphologies of active layers were observed by transmission electron microscopy , the PTATDPP : PC71BM blend shows clearly a fibril nanostructure ( fibril width ∼ 30 nm ) with the formation of a bi-continuous network , whereas the PTAFDPP : PC71BM blend shows a phase - separated morphology without the formation of distinct nanostructures , as shown in Fig.

Let's think step by step.

1. PTATDPP : This is a compound name, where PTATDPP is the name of the active layer material.
2. PC71BM : This is also a compound name, where PC71BM is the name of another active layer material.
3. fibril width : This is a property name describing the width of the fibrils in the PTATDPP : PC71BM blend.
4. bi-continuous network : This is a property name describing the network structure formed by the PTATDPP : PC71BM blend.
5. phase-separated morphology : This is a property name describing the morphology of the PTAFDPP : PC71BM blend.
6. distinct nanostructures : This is a property name describing the absence of specific nanostructures in the PTAFDPP : PC71BM blend.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Material Property.

1. fibril width (property of PTATDPP : PC71BM blend)
2. bi-continuous network (property of PTATDPP : PC71BM blend)
3. phase-separated morphology (property of PTAFDPP : PC71BM blend)

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Property Name |
| --- |
| fibril width of PTATDPP : PC71BM blend |
| bi-continuous network of PTATDPP : PC71BM blend |
| phase-separated morphology of PTAFDPP : PC71BM blend |

PV.content:
Please identify the "Property Value" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: When the morphologies of active layers were observed by transmission electron microscopy , the PTATDPP : PC71BM blend shows clearly a fibril nanostructure ( fibril width ∼ 30 nm ) with the formation of a bi-continuous network , whereas the PTAFDPP : PC71BM blend shows a phase - separated morphology without the formation of distinct nanostructures , as shown in Fig.

Let's think step by step.

1. PTATDPP : PC71BM blend - This is a compound entity, where PTATDPP and PC71BM are the individual components.
2. fibril width - This is a quantitative property, specifically the width of the fibrils in the PTATDPP : PC71BM blend.
3. ∼ 30 nm - This is a value representing the size or width of the fibrils in the PTATDPP : PC71BM blend.
4. bi-continuous network - This is a descriptive property, referring to the continuous connection of the fibrils in the PTATDPP : PC71BM blend.
5. PTAFDPP : PC71BM blend - This is another compound entity, where PTAFDPP and PC71BM are the individual components.
6. phase-separated morphology - This is a descriptive property, referring to the separation of different phases in the PTAFDPP : PC71BM blend.
7. without the formation of distinct nanostructures - This is a descriptive property, indicating the absence of well-defined nanostructures in the PTAFDPP : PC71BM blend.
8. Fig. - This is a reference to a figure or image that provides visual evidence to support the observations made in the paragraph. It is not a property value, but rather a reference to a visual representation of the data.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Value of Material Property.
1. fibril width - This is a quantitative property, specifically the width of the fibrils in the PTATDPP : PC71BM blend, with a value of ∼ 30 nm.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Value".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Property Value |
| --- |
| fibril width of ∼ 30 nm in the PTATDPP : PC71BM blend |
